en.header_subtitle: We are getting an unprecedented number of new users.
en.title: Discover your Personal Gold Mine
en.subtitle: Join thousands of people investing in the gold market!
en.agreement_first: I agree to the processing of my email address for the purposes of receiving commercial offers that we believe will be of interest to you on behalf of the companies and industries explicitly detailed in our Privacy Policy

passtest: The password must be 8 characters long.
Must contain at least 1 capital letter.
more_title:
Your data is always protected with us.
You can change your mind anytime by...
en.more_decription: You can change your mind at any time by clicking on the unsubscribe link in the footer of any email you receive from us. We will treat your information with respect. By clicking above, you agree that we may process your information in accordance with these terms.
en.join_title: With gold prices rising, there’s never been a better time to invest.
en.join_subtitle: Sign up today and keep your money safe by investing in gold!
en.join_description: Gold has been the key measure of wealth for hundreds of years and as industries and technologies advance, gold still provides a solid standard for global finances. After the 2008 financial crash, gold was one of the few industries which stayed strong and it’s long history and physical value mean that it will survive every market upset.
en.invest_main_title: Invest in gold with Golden Profit

invest_descriptions.name: Register
text: It only takes a few minutes to register your account with Golden Profit's streamlined sign-up system. Simply fill in your details and we’ll do the rest.

invest_descriptions.name: Invest
text: You will be contacted by one of our personal brokers who will tell you exactly what you need to do to make your first investment.
The minimum amount required to deposit is $250.

invest_descriptions.name: Trade
text: Once you have activated your account by depositing your funds, you’ll be able to start investing in your future.

en.trade_title: The trend is speaking for itself
en.trade_description: As more and more investors begin to re-establish an interest in gold, prices have begun to sky-rocket. That's because gold offers more security than any other commodity and in a world of growing financial upheaval, security is hard to find. Look at the chart below to see just how much the price of gold has risen in the last 12 months.
en.famous_description: There are a lot of big names in trading. Here is what some of the most famous traders have to say.

famous_body.name: Alexander Elder
famous_body.text: You can be free. You can live and work anywhere in the world. You can be independent from routine and not answer to anybody.

famous_body.name: Ed Seykota
famous_body.text: Win or lose, everybody gets what they want out of the market. Some people seem to like to lose, so they win by losing money.

famous_body.name: William O’Neil
famous_body.text: What seems too high and risky to the majority generally goes higher and what seems low and cheap generally goes lower.

famous_body.name: Warren Buffett
famous_body.text: You don't need to be a rocket scientist. Investing is not a game where the guy with the 160 IQ beats the guy with 130 IQ.

en.benefits_subtitle: It's the best way how to invest your money

benefits_information.title: Accurate Trading
benefits_information.description: Use Golden PROFIT’s live up-to-the-minute trading updates to make the right decisions, each and every time you trade.

benefits_information.title: Cutting Edge Technology
benefits_information.description: Golden PROFIT uses the latest trading engine to keep all of your trades running smoothly and effectively and to ensure that you have the best protection available.

benefits_information.title: Trading you can Trust
benefits_information.description: Golden PROFIT are world leaders online trading and have been recognised globally for their intuitive design and user-friendly platform.

faq_question.question: How much can I make?
faq_question.answer: Your profit depends on your decisions and input. Those who compound their interest into making more high-priced trades, stand to earn a lot more than those who place trades at lower levels. However, it completely depends on how you wish to trade.

faq_question.question: Do I need any trading experience?
faq_question.answer: Golden PROFIT has been designed for every level of trader and can give you the skills and confidence you need to make high-level trades. The platform includes the information you need to begin trading, whether you’re a complete beginner or professional trader.

faq_question.question: How much does it cost?
faq_question.answer: Our platform is completely free to use. All you need is your starting capital of $250 which is yours to invest and trade.

faq_question.question: How many members are there?
faq_question.answer: We have over 250,000 members using our services worldwide.

faq_question.question: What companies can I use?
faq_question.answer: You can trade all public companies from all the major stock exchanges in the world. If you’ve heard of it, you can trade on it!

disclaimer: Earnings and income representations made by Golden Profit, (collectively “This Website” only used as aspirational examples of your earnings potential. The success of those in the testimonials and other examples are exceptional results and therefore are not intended as a guarantee that you or others will achieve the same results. Individual results will vary and are entirely dependent on your use of Golden Profit.

This Website is not responsible for your actions. You bear sole responsibility for your actions and decisions when using products and services and therefore you should always exercise caution and due diligence. You agree that this Website is not liable to you in any way for the results of using our products and services. See our Terms & Conditions for our full disclaimer of liability and other restrictions.

This Website may receive compensation for products and services they recommend to you. If you do not want This Website to be compensated for a recommendation, then we advise that you search online for a similar product through a non-affiliate link.
All characters, information and events depicted on This Website are entirely fictitious. Any similarity to actual events or persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
bottom_info: We use cookies to understand how you use our site and to improve your experience. This includes personalizing content and advertising. By continuing to use our site, you accept our use of cookies, revised Privacy Policy and Terms of Use. This website is an Advertorial.

da.header_subtitle: Vi har fået et hidtil uset antal nye brugere.
da.title: Opdag din Personlige Guldmine
da.subtitle: Slut dig til tusindvis af mennesker som investerer i guldmarkedet!
da.title_form: LAV OM PÅ DIT LIV I DAG!
da.agreement_first: Jeg giver mit samtykke til at min e-mailadresse lagres med det formål, at jeg kan modtage information og kommercielle tilbud om tradingsoftware og -platforme.
da.agreement_second: Jeg erklærer mig enig i disse Vilkår og Betingelser og denne Privatlivspolitik
more_title: Du kan skifte mening til enhver tid ved at klikke på afmeldelseslinket i..
da.more_decription: bunden af enhver e-mail, du modtager fra os. Vi vil behandle dine data med respekt. Ved at klikke ovenfor giver du samtykke til, at vi må bearbejde dine data i overensstemmelse med disse vilkår.
da.join_title: Som guldpriserne stiger, har der aldrig været et bedre tidspunkt at investere på.
da.join_subtitle: Tilmeld dig i dag og hold dine penge sikret ved at investere i guld!
da.join_description: Guld har været målestokken for rigdom gennem hundredevis af år, og i takt med at industrier og teknologier udvikles, udgør guld stadig en sold standard for global finans. Efter økonomikrisen i 2008 var guld en af de få industrier som forblev stærke, og dets lange historie og fysiske værdi betyder, at det vil overleve enhver markedsnedgang.
da.invest_main_title: Investér i guld med Golden Profit

invest_descriptions.name: Tilmeld dig
text: Det tager kun få minutter at registrere din konto i Golden Profits strømlinede tilmeldingssystem. Udfyld blot dine detaljer og vi klarer resten.

invest_descriptions.name: Investér
text: Du vil blive kontaktet af en af vores personlige mæglere, som fortæller dig præcis hvad du skal gøre for at foretage din første investering.
Det påkrævede mindstebeløb, der skal indbetales er 1639 kr.

invest_descriptions.name: Handl
text: Når du har aktiveret din konto ved at indsætte et depositum, vil du kunne begynde at investere i din fremtid.

da.trade_title: Trenden som taler for sig selv
da.trade_description: I takt med at flere og flere investorer begynder at genetablere en interesse i guld, er priserne fløjet i vejret. Dette skyldes, at guld tilbyder mere sikkerhed end alle andre råvarer, og i en verden af voksende økonomisk ustabilitet er sikkerhed svær at finde. Kig på skemaet herunder for at se, hvor meget guldpriserne er steget i de sidste 12 måneder.
da.famous_description: Der er mange store navne indenfor trading. Her er hvad nogle af de mest berømte tradere havde at sige.

famous_body.name: Alexander Elder
famous_body.text: Du kan være fri. Du kan bo og arbejde hvor som helst i verden. Du kan være uafhængig af rutiner og slippe for at stå til ansvar overfor nogen.

famous_body.name: Ed Seykota
famous_body.text: Alle får det de vil have ud af markedet, uanset om de vinder eller taber. Nogle mennesker ser ud til at kunne lide at tabe, så de vinder ved at tabe penge.

famous_body.name: William O’Neil
famous_body.text: Det der ser ud til at være for højt og risikabelt for flertallet, går generelt højere, og det der ser lavt og billigt ud, går generelt lavere.

famous_body.name: Warren Buffett
famous_body.text: Du behøver ikke at være raketforsker. Investering er ikke et spil, hvor fyren med en IQ på 160 slår fyren med en IQ på 130.

da.benefits_subtitle: Det er den bedste måde at investere dine penge på

benefits_information.title: Nøjagtig Handel
benefits_information.description: Brug Golden PROFITs live handelsopdateringer, som opdateres hvert minut, til at træffe de rigtige beslutninger hver eneste gang du handler.

benefits_information.title: Den Nyeste Teknologi
benefits_information.description: Golden PROFIT bruger den nyeste handelsmaskine for at holde alle dine handler kørende glat og effektivt og for at sikre, at du har den bedst mulige beskyttelse.

benefits_information.title: Handel du kan Stole på
benefits_information.description: Golden PROFIT er blandt verdens førende inden for online handel og er anerkendt globalt for deres intuitive design og brugervenlige platform.

faq_question.question: Hvor meget kan jeg tjene?
faq_question.answer: Din profit afhænger af dine beslutninger og inputs. De handlende, som kombinerer deres renter og foretager dyrere handeler, står til at tjene meget mere end dem som handler på lavere niveauer. Men det kommer dog helt an på, hvordan du ønsker at handle.

faq_question.question: Skal jeg have nogen handelserfaring?
faq_question.answer: Golden PROFIT er designet til handlende på alle niveauer og kan give dig de evner og den selvtillid du behøver for at handle på højt niveau. Platformen inkluderer de informationer du behøver for at komme i gang med at handle, hvad enten du er nybegynder eller professionel handlende.

faq_question.question: Hvor meget koster det?
faq_question.answer: Vores platform er helt gratis at bruge. Alt hvad du behøver er en startkapital på 250$ (~1625 kr), som du kan investere og handle med.

faq_question.question: Hvor mange medlemmer er der?
faq_question.answer: Vi har over 250.000 medlemmer som bruger vores services verden over.

faq_question.question: Hvilke virksomheder kan jeg bruge?
faq_question.answer: Du kan handle med alle offentlige virksomheder fra alle de største børser i verden. Hvis du har hørt om virksomheden, kan du handle med den!

Denne webside er ikke ansvarlig for dine handlinger. Denne webside kan modtage betaling for produkter og tjenester de anbefaler til dig. Hvis du ikke ønsker at denne webside skal få betaling for en anbefaling, anbefaler vi at du søger online efter et lignende produkt gennem et link fra en ikke-samhørende partner.

Ved at fortsætte med at bruge vores side accepterer du vores brug af cookies samt vores reviderede Fortrolighedspolitik og Betingelser for brug. Denne webside er en tekstreklame.
